text: sorting out lesson plans & seeing those lightbulb moments in class really upped my adult game
real talk - balancing work and grad studies hits different when you're scraping by 😪 feels adult af making those hard choices between textbooks or takeout... dinner's usually whatever's cheapest tbh!
honestly felt that adult vibe when trying to stretch my teacher's salary – making ends meet gets real fast, especially figuring out rent prices here 🎯
yeah tbh think teachers just chill n read all day? nah we’re swamped grading papers at 2am 😂 seriously tho most times i'm multitasking stuff i'd never thought be part of teaching!

hitting 30 definitely sparks those “settle down” vibes here too – except when your paycheck’s playing hide-n-seek every month 😂 gotta love those "where's your car? house? retirement fund?" convos... all i hear es pura presión! 🙃
